EmailTemplate.name: 10-24-22 HOS Aloha Cloud Customer com.Revised Silver Essentials
EmailTemplate.subject: Attention: New Silver Essentials App Updates are Available
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Our new update is live and ready to go so your point of sale can help you run your business even better. Version 5.10 of Silver Essentials includes:  - Performance Enhancements  - Bug Fixes  If you have automatic updates enabled, your system will update to the latest version automatically once it's available.  If you don't have automatic updates enabled, you can update to 5.10 by tapping the “Upgrade” button from the cloud icon on the POS. <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
